snippet: An American Border Patrol agent opened fire on a group of people throwing rocks from across the Mexican border, and the authorities said one person was hit.
abstract: United States Border Patrol authorities say agent in Nogales, Ariz, opened fire on group of people throwing rocks from across Mexican border, hitting one person; Mexican government issues statement condemning use of deadly force in such situations.
lead_paragraph: An American Border Patrol agent opened fire on a group of people throwing rocks from across the Mexican border, and the authorities said one person was hit.

headline.main: Body Found After Clash at the Mexican Border
headline.print_headline: One Is Dead After Clash At Border
